personalInfo.name: Shanvi Soni
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.tagline: Passionate B.Tech Computer Science student crafting beautiful, user-focused web applications with the MERN stack

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Working on real-world projects using the MERN stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js
Collaborating with the development team on UI design and API integration
Applying best practices in Git/GitHub, version control, and deployment
Strengthening core skills in frontend and backend development under industry mentorship

summary: I'm a motivated B.Tech Computer Science student at SAGE University, Bhopal, with a strong passion for full-stack development. Currently maintaining a CGPA of 8.28, I combine academic excellence with hands-on industry experience.

As a MERN Stack Intern at Reactify Labs, I work on real-world projects, collaborate with development teams, and continuously strengthen my skills in both frontend and backend development under industry mentorship.
